articles.title: China is using vaccines to push its agenda in Latin America, and the U.S. is behind the curve, experts say - NBC News

articles.content: WASHINGTON China is using Covid-19 vaccines to push its political and trade agenda across Latin America and the Caribbean, and the U.S. risks losing influence in the region without prompt action, law… [+9547 chars]
